TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用來叫用編譯器的參數。

span.span: Represents the parameters used to invoke a compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件代表的設定和選項介面。A object represents the settings and options for an interface. 如果您正在編譯可執行程式，您必須設定屬性`true`。If you are compiling an executable program, you must set the property to `true`. 當設`false`，編譯器會產生類別程式庫。When the is set to `false`, the compiler will generate a class library. 根據預設，新以初始化其屬性設定為`false`。By default, a new is initialized with its property set to `false`. 如要從 CodeDOM 圖表編譯可執行檔，即必須在圖表中定義 。If you are compiling an executable from a CodeDOM graph, a must be defined in the graph. 如果有多個程式碼進入點，您可以指定定義設定的類別名稱使用的進入點類別屬性。If there are multiple code entry points, you can indicate the class that defines the entry point to use by setting the name of the class to the property. 您可以指定輸出組件中的檔案名稱屬性。You can specify a file name for the output assembly in the property. 否則，會使用預設的輸出檔名稱。Otherwise, a default output file name will be used. 若要產生的組件中包含偵錯資訊，請設定屬性`true`。To include debug information in a generated assembly, set the property to `true`. 如果您的專案參考的任何組件，您必須指定組件名稱為中的項目設屬性叫用編譯時使用。If your project references any assemblies, you must specify the assembly names as items in a set to the property of the used when invoking compilation. 您可以編譯的組件，藉由設定寫入至記憶體，而不是磁碟屬性`true`。You can compile an assembly that is written to memory rather than disk by setting the property to `true`. 當組件在記憶體中產生時，您的程式碼可從 的 屬性取得所產生組件的參考。When an assembly is generated in memory, your code can obtain a reference to the generated assembly from the property of a . 如果組件寫入至磁碟，您可以從產生的組件取得路徑屬性。If an assembly is written to disk, you can obtain the path to the generated assembly from the property of a . 若要指定中斷編譯的警告層級，請將 屬性設為整數，表示要中斷編譯的警告層級。To specify a warning level at which to halt compilation, set the property to an integer that represents the warning level at which to halt compilation. 您也可以設定編譯器設定會在出現警告時，中斷編譯屬性`true`。You can also configure the compiler to halt compilation if warnings are encountered by setting the property to `true`. 若要在叫用編譯處理序時指定使用的自訂命令列引數字串，請在 屬性中設定字串。To specify a custom command-line arguments string to use when invoking the compilation process, set the string in the property. 如果需要 Win32 安全性權杖才能叫用編譯器處理序，請在 屬性中指定權杖。If a Win32 security token is required to invoke the compiler process, specify the token in the property. 若要在已編譯的組件中包含.NET Framework 資源檔案，加入的資源檔名稱屬性。To include .NET Framework resource files in the compiled assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要參考另一個組件中的.NET Framework 資源，新增的資源檔名稱屬性。To reference .NET Framework resources in another assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要包含 Win32 資源檔編譯的組件中，指定的名稱中的 Win32 資源檔屬性。To include a Win32 resource file in the compiled assembly, specify the name of the Win32 resource file in the property. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下列範例會建立簡單的 Hello World 程式 CodeDOM 來源圖表。The following example builds a CodeDOM source graph for a simple Hello World program. 來源然後儲存到檔案，編譯成可執行檔，並執行中。The source is then saved to a file, compiled into an executable, and run. `CompileCode`方法將示範如何使用類別，以指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The `CompileCode` method illustrates how to use the class to specify various compiler settings and options. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CompilerOptions { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在叫用編譯器時，要使用的選擇性命令列引數。

span.span: Gets or sets optional command-line arguments to use when invoking the compiler.

value.span: 編譯器的任何其他命令列引數。

span.span: Any additional command-line arguments for the compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 叫用命令列編譯器時，通常包含此字串在命令列上的。An typically includes this string on the command line when invoking a command-line compiler. 根據預設，此屬性會包含空字串。By default, this property contains an empty string. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用來指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CoreAssemblyFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定核心或標準組件名稱，其中包含基本型別，例如 、 或 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the core or standard assembly that contains basic types such as , , or .

value.span: 包含基本型別的核心組件的名稱。

span.span: The name of the core assembly that contains basic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值為空字串或`null`，編譯器會使用預設的核心組件。If the value of this property is an empty string or `null`, the compiler uses the default core assembly. 根據編譯器的版本中，預設的核心組件可能是 mscorlib.dll 或 System.Runtime.dll Framework 目錄或參考組件目錄中。Depending on the compiler version, the default core assembly may be mscorlib.dll or System.Runtime.dll in a Framework directory or reference assembly directory. 如果這個屬性的值不是空的程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM) 明確參考指定組件，並會發出編譯器選項，會導致編譯器隱含地在編譯期間未參考任何組件...If the value of this property is not empty, the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) explicitly references the specified assembly and emits compiler options that cause the compiler to not reference any assemblies implicitly during compilation.. 針對所只隱含參考的核心或標準組件的編譯器預設值，這個屬性可用其本身。For compilers that reference the core or standard assembly only implicitly by default, this property can be used on its own. 除了核心或標準組件隱含參考的組件的編譯器，使用此選項可能需要指定其他項目中的屬性。For compilers that implicitly reference assemblies in addition to the core or standard assembly, using this option may require specifying additional entries in the property. > [!NOTE] > 或實作可以選擇忽略這個屬性。An or implementation may choose to ignore this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EmbeddedResources As StringCollection

summary.span: 取得編譯組件輸出時要包含的 .NET Framework 資源檔。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files to include when compiling the assembly output.

value.span: 集合，其中包含 .NET Framework 的資源檔路徑，這些資源要放入所產生的組件內。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources to include in the generated assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內嵌的資源會建置到產生的組件輸出檔案。Embedded resources are built into the generated assembly output file. 包含透過這個屬性的檔案是類似於`/resource`支援許多.NET Framework 編譯器的命令列引數。Including files through this property is similar to the `/resource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 並非所有的編譯器都支援.NET Framework 資源檔，因此您應該針對這項支援藉由呼叫測試旗標方法。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 將一或多個.NET Framework 資源檔案路徑加入至傳回在已編譯的組件中內嵌的檔案資源。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to embed the file resources in the compiled assembly. 編譯錯誤; 中加入重複或無效的檔案路徑的結果請確認每個字串會指定有效的.NET Framework 資源檔的唯一路徑。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用要包含預設或中性文化特性的.NET Framework 資源的組件; 使用屬性來參考附屬組件中的.NET Framework 資源。Use to include default or neutral culture .NET Framework resources for an assembly; use the property to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用來指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值為`false`，就會產生 DLL。If the value of this property is `false`, a DLL will be generated. 根據預設值，這個屬性的值為 `false`。By default, the value of this property is `false`. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用來指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要在已編譯的可執行檔中包含偵錯資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include debug information in the compiled executable.

value.span: 如果應該產生偵錯資訊，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if debug information should be generated; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LinkedResources As StringCollection

summary.span: 取得目前來源中所參考的 .NET Framework 資源檔。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files that are referenced in the current source.

value.span: 集合，其中包含來源所參考之 .NET Framework 資源的檔案路徑。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources that are referenced by the source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連結的資源檔可讓您不需將實際的資源內嵌在組件參考.NET Framework 資源的組件。Linked resource files allow your assembly to reference .NET Framework resources without embedding the actual resources in the assembly. 參考檔，透過這個屬性是類似於`/linkresource`支援許多.NET Framework 編譯器的命令列引數。Referencing files through this property is similar to the `/linkresource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 並非所有的編譯器都支援.NET Framework 資源檔，因此您應該針對這項支援藉由呼叫測試旗標方法。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 將一或多個.NET Framework 資源檔案路徑加入至傳回編譯的組件中建立資源的連結。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to create links for the resources in the compiled assembly. 編譯錯誤; 中加入重複或無效的檔案路徑的結果請確認每個字串會指定有效的.NET Framework 資源檔的唯一路徑。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用來參考附屬組件中的.NET Framework 資源的特定文化特性的當地語系化; 使用將資源內嵌至編譯的組件的屬性。Use to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies, localized for a particular culture; use the property to embed the resources into the compiled assembly. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用來指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得目前專案所參考的組件。

span.span: Gets the assemblies referenced by the current project.

value.span: 集合，其中包含要編譯的來源所參考的組件名稱。

span.span: A collection that contains the assembly names that are referenced by the source to compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串集合應該組成，或包含，目前的專案所參考的組件。The string collection should consist of, or include, the assemblies referenced by the current project. 將組件檔案名稱加入至傳回匯入組件資訊清單，並參考目前專案中的組件類型資訊。Add assembly file names to the returned to import the assembly manifest and reference the assembly type information in the current project. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用來指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ TempFiles { System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ get(); void set(System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含暫存檔案的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection that contains the temporary files.
A collection that contains the temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的暫存檔案要保留或刪除完成時的值為基礎的編譯器活動集合中的屬性。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 屬性設定如果集合使用建立具有建構函式`keepFiles`參數設定為`true`。The property is set if the collection is created using the constructor with the `keepFiles` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用來指定不同的編譯器設定和選項。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Resource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要連結至已編譯組件內之 Win32 資源檔的檔名。

span.span: Gets or sets the file name of a Win32 resource file to link into the compiled assembly.

value.span: 將連結至已編譯組件內的 Win32 資源檔。

span.span: A Win32 resource file that will be linked into the compiled assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連結檔，透過這個屬性是類似於`/winres`和`/winresource`支援許多.NET Framework 編譯器的命令列引數。Linking files through this property is similar to the `/winres` and `/winresource` command-line arguments supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 使用Win32 資源檔編譯至組件。Use to compile a Win32 resource file into the assembly. 使用或使用.NET Framework 資源檔編譯。Use or to compile with .NET Framework resource files. 並非所有的編譯器都支援 Win32 資源檔，所以您應該測試此支援，再藉由呼叫連結的資源檔的程式碼產生器旗標方法。Not all compilers support Win32 resource files, so you should test a code generator for this support before linking a resource file by calling the method with the flag .
